Title: Bernie
Writer: Albert Dupontel (dialogue), Albert Dupontel (screenplay), Gilles Laurent
Actors: Claude Perron, Albert Dupontel, Roland Blanche, Hélène Vincent
Plot: Bernie, a 30 years old orphan, decides to leave his orphanage and find his parents. After an investigation, he meets Marion, a young heroin addict and falls in love with her. He believes that his family was victim of a plot and this is why they deserted him.
Production: Kasso Inc. Productions, Le Studio Canal +, Contre Prod, Rézo Films, Ulysse Films
